properties.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:49PM PST until January 1 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches
in valley locations with 2 to 6 inches in the mountains. Light
freezing rain is also possible Wednesday morning.

* WINDS...Northwest 10 to 25 mph with gusts of 25 to 55 mph which
will result in blowing and drifting of snow.

* WHERE...Southwestern Elko County and South Central Elko County.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM PST Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute. Brief heavy snow showers could lead to significantly
reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM PST WEDNESDAY
